import sys

n, k, m = [int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()]
a = [int(i) for i in sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split()]

sum_a = sum(a)

if sum_a > m*n:
    print(-1)
else:
    print(max(0, m*n-sum_a))

n, k, m = map(int, input().split())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

s = sum(a)

if m * n - s <= k:
    print(m * n - s)
else:
    print(-1)
